EnableTrackersWithoutProfession.Name: Enable trackers without profession
EnableTrackersWithoutProfession.Desc: If enabled, tracking icons will be visible even if you don't have the "Tracker" profession.
ReplaceTrackersWithForageIcons.Name: Replace trackers with forage icons
ReplaceTrackersWithForageIcons.Desc: If enabled, tracking icons will be replaced with images of the items being tracked.
DrawBehindInterface.Name: Draw trackers behind interface
DrawBehindInterface.Desc: If enabled, tracking icons will be drawn behind the game's interface. Use this if they obstruct the UI too much.
TrackerPixelScale.Name: Tracker pixel scale
TrackerPixelScale.Desc: The size of each pixel in the tracking icon (default 4). Increase this to make trackers easier to see.
TrackDefaultForage.Name: Track default forage
TrackDefaultForage.Desc: If enabled, most kinds of forage items will be tracked.
TrackArtifactSpots.Name: Track artifact spots
TrackArtifactSpots.Desc: If enabled, buried artifact spots will be tracked.
TrackPanningSpots.Name: Track panning spots
TrackPanningSpots.Desc: If enabled, ore panning locations in the water will be tracked.
TrackSpringOnions.Name: Track spring onions
TrackSpringOnions.Desc: If enabled, harvestable spring onions will be tracked.
TrackBerryBushes.Name: Track berry bushes
TrackBerryBushes.Desc: If enabled, harvestable berry bushes will be tracked.
TrackWalnutBushes.Name: Track walnut bushes
TrackWalnutBushes.Desc: If enabled, harvestable walnut bushes on Ginger Island will be tracked.
